title: Trust in the Law!
description: The 1921 silent film dramatizing the life of Bass Reeves, the first black deputy U.S. marshal west of the Mississippi.
quote: There will be no mob justice today.
alt1: a hooded person rides a horse
alt2: the hooded horse rider captures a man on the ground in front of a small church
alt4: star badge: U.S. Marshal Deputy Oklahoma Terr.
